resources.string: "Play now for a chance to win 30,000 points!"
To reliably use the lock screen in the current version of Android, please set \"%s\" to ignore battery optimization in your device settings.

<font color="#FF0000">VERY IMPORTANT:</font> The \"%1$s\" has now been listed as a sleeping app and will soon stop working. Be sure to set \"%2$s\" to ignore battery optimization in your device settings.
Please set \"%s\" to ignore battery optimization in the "All Apps" list.
Explore contents faster and easier\nvia Quick View
Points will be given after the progress bar is full!\nPlease wait in order to get your points :)

"We could not retrieve the contents due to a network connection error, or contents that could be shown on the lockscreen are currently hidden.\n\nPlease check your network connection and unlock the screen to receive contents."
It will take a max. of 1 hour for the change to occur
Lockscreen Deactivated : Invalid user id set
Looks like theres nothing to see today\nPlease Come back again later.
Try again when you are connected wi-fi/data!
You\'re not following any channels yet.\nHere are some recommendations for you!
Swipe Up to see the next content
Now Swipe Down to go back to the first content
Swipe Left to read any interesting story!
Lastly, Swipe Right to unlock & finish tutorial!
Lastly, drag the Unlock button below to unlock & finish the tutorial!

[%1$s] Invite a friend to use the lockscreen, you both get %2$dP!
Enter the referral code and get your points instantly! 

Referral code : %3$s

Download: %4$s
[%1$s] Invite a friend to use the lockscreen!\nDownload: %2$s
Swipe left?\nRead content and earn points!
Shall we go back\nto the first screen?
Swipe right,\nUnlock and earn points everyday!
Now install the app\nto get more points!
Now install the app\nto get your welcome reward of __reward__p!
Go to the channel page feed
Please allow the permission: Draw over other apps to %1$s to ensure its proper functionality.
Please allow the required permission: Draw over other apps to %1$s to ensure its proper functionality.
You must be at least 16 years of age to consent to personalized lockscreen experience.
Yes, I would like to opt-out
By opting out you will no longer receive personalized ads or content
"Wait! If you confirm you wont be able to continue using the lockscreen.\nDo you wish to continue?"
"If you confirm you won't be able to continue using the lockscreen properly.\nDo you wish to continue?"
Submit your friends referral code below and get free points instantly!
Submit your friends referral code below!
Invite a friend to use the lockscreen, you both get <font color=\'red\'>%dP</font>!
Invite a friend to use the lockscreen!
Can not input your referral code.
You\'ve entered incorrectly. Please check friend\'s referral code again.
Your referral bonus is requested successfully
- The lockscreen feature is valid for Android devices only\n
- You will be credited with %dP only if you invite new users\n
- You may submit a referral code only once, after you first activate your lockscreen\n- The referral code cant be altered once its submitted\n
"The web page is not showing properly"
"Protect your device by enabling security locker feature."
"You must allow %s to draw over other apps in order to enable its lock feature. Would you like to continue?"
Draw the pattern again to confirm it
"Your hint will help you if you forget your Pattern. Use something that will help you remember but won't help someone else guess your Pattern."
Your unlock pattern has been set as:
You need to connect at least 4 dots
Remember this pattern.\nIf you forget your pattern, you\'ll need to reset your phone and all phone data will be lost.
"You must allow %s to draw over other apps in order to enable its lock feature. Would you like to continue?"
Enter a numeric PIN to unlock
Enter the PIN again to confirm it
"Your hint will help you if you forget your PIN. Use something that will help you remember but won't help someone else gues your PIN. "
Remember this PIN. If you forget your PIN, you\'ll need to reset your phone and all phone data will be lost.
You can hide this screen when your system lock screen is enabled. Would you like to hide this screen?
This screen can only be hidden when the system lock screen is enabled. Please enable your system lock screen to hide this screen.
Due to Google Play\'s policy, you may no longer go to your home screen by pressing the home button. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Your Android system lock screen is already securely set up. If you enable %s\'s security lock, you will have to unlock twice. Would you like to continue?
Looks like there\'s nothing to see today.\nBookmark contents to read again.
You can follow your favorite content channels!
You havent followed any sources yet.\n View Explore page for more!
View popular contents or view by category!
Restart Lockscreen Service : User id changed
Error; no app found for opening the link (%s)
You can collect gifts for watching ads. Collect %d more gifts to get extra points.
Page failed to load.\nPlease try again later
Scroll down the page to complete your points!
"The webpage hasn't loaded fully. Rewards will be given %ds after the page has fully loaded."
If %1$s is not installed on your device, you will be automatically redirected to the PlayStore.
Get rewards from ads!\n Select where youd like your rewards to be sent:
When you click the button below, you will be automatically connected to your %1$s account and you can start to earn.
Points will be rewarded after participation confirmation
Points will be rewarded after purchase confirmation
By clicking the button, I hereby agree to and accept buzzvil\'s terms and conditions..
Earn more by engaging in various types of campaigns!
Offers usually get refilled within an hour.\nSee you then!
Sorry! There are no available offers at this time.
Tab the back button one more time to exit
Participate in our offers! Receive all available points!
Are you sure you want to leave?
Page failed to load.\nPlease try again later
Click the button below to view ads and receive points!
Click here for more & get %d extra points
Check out the offer and get the instant reward!
Please view the web page in order to get your points.
Points will be given when the progress bar is complete!\nPlease \'wait/scroll\' in order to get your points.
Unable to open the link because active browser is not found.
You have subscribed to the rewarded ads on %1$d/%2$d
You can participate in rewarded ads by choosing the times to receive notifications. Subscribe and earn! (Notificaitons are not sent when there are no rewarded ads available)
Select when you want to receive notifications
If you unsubscribe now you will no longer receive notifications for rewarded ads. Would you like to proceed?
You have unsubscribed to the rewarded ads on %1$d/%2$d
Tab the button one more time to exit
Do you want to leave the feed?
%d points will be rewarded for visiting the feed
Click to access this feature anytime and never miss a chance!
Earn up to 10,000 points right now!
Never get bored with plenty of news and exciting contents!
Enjoying this feature? Access it anytime!
Click to reopen the pop feed!
You simply need to enable Apps that can appear on top permission from your device\'s settings:
"Allow 'Apps that can appear on top' to use %1$s."
"Find %2$s in the list of apps and allow 'Apps that can appear on top' to use %1$s."
The POP icon will disappear after a while.
The POP icon will remain translucent.
Settings menu not available on landscape mode

- Entity who collects personal information: Buzzvil Co., Ltd.
- Purpose of personal information collection: Reward payment, advertisement operation, and response to customer inquiries.
- Personal information collected: Advertising identifier (ADID or IDFA), package list, IP address, gender/age (optional).
- The period of personal information retention and use: One year from the date of termination or withdrawal of consent (Provided, if separate storage is required under the provisions of the relevant statutes, it shall be kept for the relevant period)
One-time privacy policy consent is needed for rewards
Rewards cannot be given in case of a refusal to collect and use personal information.
Enter your profile for more rewards!
Enter the year of your birth
Tab the back button one more time to exit
If you leave now, you won\'t get any points... Are you sure you want to leave right now?
Wait a little more to get your reward!
The network is not responding.\nPlease try again later.
The video cannot be played due to a network error.\nPlease try again later.
The video cannot be played due to a network error.
The video cannot be played due to a temporary error.\nPlease try again later.
We are committed in providing the Lowest Price Guarantee everyday on thousands of products.
Service is running to improve Push experience.
Disabling Fast Refresh because it requires a development bundle.
Switching to development bundle in order to enable Fast Refresh.
Failed to open Flipper. Please check that Metro is running.
Failed to load bundle. Try restarting the bundler or reconnecting your device.
By continuing, you agree to Channel\'s terms of service and privacy policy.
Are you sure you want to delete conversations?
There is no chat in progress.
It could take more than hours
Please leave a question and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
You cannot start a new chat when we\'re away.
We are closed at the moment
The chat may open again when the manager speaks back to you.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected message?\nIf you delete it, it will be deleted from all participants\' chat. This action can not be undone.
There is no application set to open this file
Failed to process. Please try again.
Failed to load data.\nPress the button below to refresh.
We apologize, but you can\'t chat for now.
We are closed at the moment. Please contact us later and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
We will be back in %s day(s)
We will be back in %s hour(s)
We will be back in %s minute(s)
Sure. Our business hours are as follows.
Give us more details about your business hours.
Photo url has been copied to clipboard
Your chat is now resolved.\nPlease rate our service.
Welcome! How can I help you today?
We will send you a SMS notification in case you miss a message.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

string.description: Content description for an icon that appears in the title area of a dialog

string.name: material_clock_toggle_content_description

string.description: Description for button to switch to select the hour [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: material_hour_selection

string.description: spoken suffix for an hour in the clock [CHAR_LIMIT=10]
string.name: material_hour_suffix

string.description: Description for button to switch to select the minute [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: material_minute_selection

string.description: spoken suffix for an amount of minutes in the clock [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: material_minute_suffix

string.description: Content description for the thumb with the maximum value in a Range slider. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: material_slider_range_end

string.description: Content description for the thumb with the minimum value in a Range slider. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: material_slider_range_start

string.description: Suffix for time in 12-hour standard, before noon. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: material_timepicker_am

resources.string: Switch to clock mode for the time input.

string.description: The label for a text field to select the hour on the time [CHAR_LIMIT=24]
string.name: material_timepicker_hour

string.description: The label for a text field to select the minute on the hour [CHAR_LIMIT=24]
string.name: material_timepicker_minute

string.description: Suffix for time in 12-hour standard, after noon. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: material_timepicker_pm

string.description: Title for the dialog with a time picker. [CHAR_LIMIT=32]
string.name: material_timepicker_select_time

resources.string: Switch to text input mode for the time input.

string.description: Content description for new notification (no number count) [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_badge_numberless_content_description

string.description: Content description for a close icon that lets the user remove content from the screen
string.name: mtrl_chip_close_icon_content_description

string.description: Plural form content description for when the number of new notifications exceeds a maximum count[CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_exceed_max_badge_number_content_description

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the next month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_next_month

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the previous month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_prev_month

string.description: a11y string read on selection change to indicate the new selection [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_announce_current_selection

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will ignore the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_cancel

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will save the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_confirm

string.description: A single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking a date within the calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_title

string.description: Placeholder for a single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_unselected

string.description: a11y string to indicate this is a header for a column of days for one day of the week (e.g., Monday) [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_day_of_week_column_header

string.description: Indicates that the user entered date cannot be parsed because its format is wrong. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format

string.description: Tells a user what an example valid entry looks like. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_example

string.description: Tells a user what format is expected for their date entry. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_use

string.description: Notifies the user that the two entered dates do not represent a valid range of dates [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_range

string.description: a11y string that informs the user that tapping this button will switch the year [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_navigate_to_year_description

string.description: Notifies the user that the entered date is outside the allowed range [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_out_of_range

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where end date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_end_selected

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where start date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_start_selected

string.description: Two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking dates within the calendar to form a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_title

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_unselected

string.description: Confirms the selection [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: mtrl_picker_save

string.description: Label for a single date selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_hint

string.description: Label for the end date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_end_hint

string.description: Label for the start date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_start_hint

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for day. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_day_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for month. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_month_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for year. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_year_abbr

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button changes the input mode to a calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_calendar_input_mode

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button switches the user to choosing a day [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_day_selection

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a day

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button changes the input mode to a text field [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_text_input_mode

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button switches the user to choosing a year [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_year_selection

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a year
Earn more points just by walking. Click the button below to activate POP pedometer!
Steps do not accumulate when pedometer is disabled
Permission to recognize your steps is required. Please note that if you select \'Deny & dont ask again\', you will not be able to use pedometer in the future.
%s steps remain until the challenge is completed
Click on completed steps to earn Points!
Steps remain until the completion of the step
All of today\'s missions have been accomplished!
Mission accomplished! Click to earn points.
The target is %s steps. Let\'s walk and get points!
Mission accomplished! Click and get %s points!
%s steps left to complete the mission!
We failed to receive data. Please try again later.
If you change the device time, the accumulated steps are reset.
You\'ve already participated today, come back tomorrow!
You didn\'t collect all the numbers this week...Please try again next week!
You\'ve collected all the numbers this week! Please check the winning numbers!
Pick a number every day and check the winning number on Sunday
This is not the winning number...\nTry again next week?
Please check your HoneyScreen\nreward earnings after 11am on Monday.
Pick a lucky number every day\nfor a chance to win on Sunday! :D
We\'re selecting the winning number. Please check it later.
Pick a number every day and check the winning number on Sunday
Please draw all the numbers next week
Please come back on Sunday to see if you won!
We could not draw your number. Try again later.
Participate an ad and get one more number!
We failed to receive data. Please try again later.
"Are you sure to download when using non-Wifi network?"
New ad slot exceeded daily request limit
We will bring you a better advertising experience
You have successfully submitted feedback, please do not submit it again
Initialization check error, please check the AndroidManifest
"Network is unavailable, please try again later."
You have prohibited from authorizing operation, please authorize it
